Building Computational teams within Boston biotech / pharma - US Data Science
Our client is a NYC-based platform company combining cutting edge ML with systems biology to build computational models for the discovery of small molecule drugs, biologics and protein degraders. An autonomous 'start-up' feel operating within the infrastructure and funding of a larger portfolio, this hire will report into the Head of Computational Biology and have an enormous impact on the direction of the company's platform.Key Responsibilities:● Developing innovative approaches and algorithms that disrupt key steps in the R&D processleveraging large-scale data● Merging state-of-the-art in silico approaches with cutting-edge machine learning (e.g., deeplearning, graph neural networks, generative methods, reinforcement learning)● Working collaboratively with experts from molecular biology, medicinal chemistry, computationalchemistry and machine learningQualifications:● MS/PhD degree in Computational Biology, Structural Biology, Bioinformatics, Systems Biology,Bioengineering, Pharmacology, Biochemistry, Biophysics, or other related subjecto We will also consider BS degrees in these areas for candidates highly qualified acrossother requirements or with significant work experience● knowledge supported by a track record of developing new methods, tools, or pipelineswith deep expertise in one or more of the following areas:o Structural computational biology and biophysicso Genomics/genome topology and regulation/genetics/mutation interpretationo Transcriptomics/RNA-seq/scRNA-seq/splicingo Epigenetics/epigenomicso Disease and cancer biologyo Systems biology, network pharmacology, molecular signalingo Bioinformatics/biomedical informatics● Experience at the intersection between computational biology and computer science:o Competent in several programming languages, preferably Python and Ro Strong understanding of statistical and machine learning concepts and methods,experience with state-of-the-art frameworks such as PyTorch, Sklearn and PyMC3,Tensorflow Probability is highly preferredo Experience working in distributed and cloud environments including GPUs is preferred
